Summary: Things moving so quickly - changing paths on a dime - or so slowly you couldn't even see them until you realized the "constellation" had changed
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister and I were camping at Baker Lake, Wa, with the family. We were outside in sleeping bags, looking at the stars - you know, how you make shapes with the stars - there was a triangle up above - gradually, we noticed the long end of the triangle had elongated - that was strange - and it was squiggling. Next, we saw what we thought was a light-house on the island in the lake - bright - like a star - but gradually, it too, became higher and higher over the island - slowly - so slowly, it squiggled over to the "star" of the triangle that had moved - elongated - this took several hours - then suddenly - like a flash - another "star" shot up over the island - incredibly fsst - then it took many minutes to "squiggle" over to the other two bright objects - they were now in a little triangle of their own - then they "squiggled" off together - so slowly, that you didn't even realize they were moving, except to see the distance now between other objects in the sky - so sneaky - at one point, they all shot out colored beams - green? red? blue? I don't quite remember - exept I ran into my folks' trailer and told them there were some UFO's in the sky - dad's response: if they offer you a ride, say NO. The next morning, when my sister and I recouted the story, he was irritated that we didn't wake him up - but we did try!!!! What was that? I have known all my life that it was not any airplanes, satellites, or anything that we have. THey were able to change course on a dime - and they were so Danged sneaky - moving so slowly - and then so fast when they wanted to....? Squiggling off into oblivion. All together like they were meeting up.....
trends: There has been one other sighting in baker lake
There were no other sightings in baker lake on or around May 31st 1964
